short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the mystical depths of an enchanted forest with this breathtaking theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cascading waterfall, bathed in soft sunlight, creates a shimmering rainbow in the heart of the jungle. The scene is full of life, with a serene deer standing at the water's edge, and a small, forgotten boat waiting by the shore. The lush greenery and magical atmosphere offer a peaceful escape, transforming your browser into a gateway to nature's untouched beauty. Perfect for those who love the calm and mystery of forest landscapes. Please note that this extension may include affiliate links.
